TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElement extends System.Xml.XmlLinkedNode

summary.span: 表示一个元素。

span.span: Represents an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素是 W3C 文档对象模型 (DOM) 中最常见的节点之一。Elements are one of the most common nodes in the W3C Document Object Model (DOM). 元素可以有与之关联的属性。Elements can have attributes associated with them. 类具有很多用于访问属性的方法 (、、、等)。 `XmlElement`The `XmlElement` class has many methods for accessing attributes (, , , , and so on). 你还可以使用属性, 该属性可返回, 使你能够按名称或索引从集合中访问属性。You can also use the property which returns an enabling you to access attributes by name or index from the collection.

related.span: 访问 DOM 中的属性

span.span: Accessing Attributes in the DOM
XML Document Object Model (DOM)

summary.span: 创建此节点的副本。

span.span: Creates a duplicate of this node.
The cloned node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用作节点的复制构造函数。This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes. 重复的节点没有父级 (返回`null`)。The duplicate node has no parent ( returns `null`). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的元素, 将其克隆, 然后将两个元素添加到 XML 文档中。The following example creates a new element, clones it, and then adds both elements into an XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 节点按其在树的前序遍历中遇到的顺序放置。The nodes are placed in the order in which they would be encountered in a preorder traversal of the tree. > [!NOTE] > 建议使用或方法, 而不是方法。It is recommended that you use the or method instead of the method. ## Examples 下面的示例获取并显示所有书名。The following example gets and displays all the book titles. summary.span: 获取或设置节点及其所有子级的串联值。

span.span: Gets or sets the concatenated values of the node and all its children.

value.span: 节点及其所有子级的串联值。

span.span: The concatenated values of the node and all its children.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性会将所有子级替换为给定字符串的已分析内容, 因此不会保留子节点。Setting this property replaces all the children with the parsed contents of the given string, so children nodes are not preserved. 设置操作后的唯一子节点是文本节点。The only child node after the set operation is a text node. 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例对和`InnerText` 属性进行了比较。The following example compares the `InnerText` and properties. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的标记格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the tag format of the element.

value.span: 如果元素将以短标记格式 "<item/>" 进行序列化, 则为;>对于长>格式<"item</item"。

span.span: if the element is to be serialized in the short tag format "<item/>"; for the long format "<item></item>".

value.span: 当设置该属性时，如果设置为 ，则移除该元素的子级并以短标记格式序列化该元素。

span.span: When setting this property, if set to , the children of the element are removed and the element is serialized in the short tag format.

value.span: 如果设置为 ，则更改该属性的值（不管该元素是否具有内容）；如果该元素为空，则以长格式对其进行序列化。

span.span: If set to , the value of the property is changed (regardless of whether or not the element has content); if the element is empty, it is serialized in the long format.

value.span: 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。

span.span: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension of the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例将内容添加到一个空元素。The following example adds content to an empty element. param.name: name
param.span: 要创建或更改的特性的名称。

span.span: The name of the attribute to create or alter.
This is a qualified name.

param.span: 如果该名称包含一个冒号，则将其解析为前缀和本地名称两个部分。

span.span: If the name contains a colon it is parsed into prefix and local name components.
The value to set for the attribute.

summary.span: 设置具有指定名称的特性的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attribute with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果元素中已经存在具有相同名称的属性, 则其值将更改为的`value`。If an attribute with the same name is already present in the element, its value is changed to that of `value`. `value`是一个简单字符串。`value` is a simple string. 在设置时, 不会对其进行分析。It is not parsed as it is being set. 任何标记 (如识别为实体引用的语法) 被视为文本文本, 并在写出时需要由实现进行正确转义。若要分配包含实体引用的属性值, 用户必须创建一个节点以及所有和节点, 生成适当的子树, 并使用将其分配为属性的值。Any markup, such as syntax to be recognized as an entity reference, is treated as literal text and needs to be properly escaped by the implementation when it is written out. In order to assign an attribute value that contains entity references, the user must create an node plus any and nodes, build the appropriate subtree and use to assign it as the value of an attribute.

exception.span: 指定的名称包含无效字符。

span.span: The specified name contains an invalid character.
The node is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlAttribute`不具有任何子级。The `XmlAttribute` does not have any children. 使用可向属性分配文本值, 或使用 (或类似方法) 向属性添加子级。Use to assign a text value to the attribute or use (or a similar method) to add children to the attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例将属性添加到元素。The following example adds an attribute to an element.
